Title: CS6 - Java on the PC
Body: The following is a rough outline of the steps necessary to move the HMCSupport library to a PC and to create a working CLASSPATH once you have installed the 1.0.2 ftp the directories and all their files from /home/osiris/cs/cs5/java files and store them in 2 directories, e.g., c:\java\lib\Acme and c:\java\lib\HMC Note, that if you use ws-ftp then entire directories can be ftp'ed otherwise, individual files would need to be ftp'ed.
